snippet.title: Trifox - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Trifox is a twin-stick action-adventure game inspired by classic platformers. 

Fight your way through swarms of enemies,
engage in thrilling boss fights and overcome exciting environmental challenges as you discover that there is more to your quest than meets the eye …

Coming to PC & Consoles in 2020

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1211240/Trifox/

Twitter: http://twitter.trifox-game.com
Facebook : http://facebook.trifox-game.com
Discord: http://discord.trifox-game.com
